alert.note: Alert for Scott; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 7:04AM CST until December 14 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Smith County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 704 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from White Oak to near Magee, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... White Oak around 710 AM CST. Burns around 720 AM CST. Raleigh and Homewood around 725 AM CST. Pineville around 740 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Sylvarena and Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
